|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx_s       = 不明白「神之眼」的原理？嗯... 我想想，给你打个比方吧。引导视线的器官是眼睛，而引导元素力的器官是「神之眼」。这样就很简单了吧。
|vo_07_01_tx_t       = 不明白「神之眼」的原理？嗯…我想想，給（你/妳）打個比方吧。引導視線的器官是眼睛，而引導元素力的器官是「神之眼」。這樣就很簡單了吧。
|vo_07_01_rm         = Bù míngbái "Shénzhīyǎn" de yuánlǐ? Ńg... Wǒ xiǎngxiǎng, gěi nǐ dǎ gè bǐfāng ba. Yǐndǎo shìxiàn de qìguān shì yǎnjīng, ér yǐndǎo yuánsùlì de qìguān shì "Shénzhīyǎn". Zhèyàng jiù hěn jiǎndānle ba.
|vo_07_01_tl         = You don't understand the concept of "Visions"? Hm... let me think, I'll give you an analogy. The tool that guides perception is the eye, and the tool that guides the elements is a "Vision." This should be simpler to understand.
|vo_07_02_title_s    = 有什么想要分享…

|vo_07_02_rm         = Nǐ xǐhuān jiǔ ma? Púgōngyīng Jiǔ de kǒugǎn jiù hěn tèbié. Shénme? Hái méi dào hējiǔ de niánjì? Hēhē, nà shìyīshì Méngdé de píngguǒniàng ba, wǒ zhīdào yījiā hái suàn búcuò de diàn.
|vo_07_02_tl         = Do you like to drink wine? The mouthfeel of Dandelion Wine is very unique. What? You're not old enough to drink? Haha, then you should try Mondstadt's apple cider, I know a place that's not bad.

|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg

What, you're interested<ref group="TN •">{{zh|心动|rm=xīndòng}} literally means to have one's heart moved, and is colloquially used to express excitement, interest, or a crush</ref> too?
|vo_08_07_title_s    = 关于迪奥娜…
|vo_08_07_title_t    = 關於迪奧娜…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Diona]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diona.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx_s       = 你也尝过了迪奥娜调的酒？还没到喝酒的年纪呐。哈哈，哎呀，可惜，真是可惜，这种快乐无法跟你共享。呵呵，只能期待你早点长大喽。
|vo_08_07_tx_t       = （你/妳）也嘗過了迪奧娜調的酒？還沒到喝酒的年紀吶。哈哈，哎呀，可惜，真是可惜，這種快樂無法跟（你/妳）共用。呵呵，只能期待（你/妳）早點長大嘍。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Nǐ yě chángguòle Dí'àonà tiáo de jiǔ? Hái méi dào hē jiǔ de niánjì nà. Hāhā, āiyā, kěxí, zhēnshi kěxí, zhè zhǒng kuàilè wúfǎ gēn nǐ gòngxiǎng. Hēhē, zhǐ néng qídài nǐ zǎodiǎn zhǎng dà lóu.
|vo_08_07_tl         = You've also tasted Diona's drinks? Ah, so you aren't old enough to drink. Haha, it's a shame, really a shame, that this kind of enjoyment can't be shared with you. Hehe, I'll just have to hope that you grow up soon.
|vo_08_08_title_s    = 关于法尔伽…
|vo_08_08_title_t    = 關於法爾伽…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 说来可惜，现在的西风骑士团里，根本没人继承大团长的行事作风。唉…我个人倒还挺欣赏那种的。
|vo_08_08_tx_t       = 說來可惜，現在的西風騎士團裡，根本沒人繼承大團長的行事作風。唉…我個人倒還挺欣賞那種的。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Shuō lái kěxí, xiànzài de Xīfēng Qíshìtuán lǐ, gēnběn méi rén jìchéng Dà-tuánzhǎng de xíngshì zuòfēng. Āi... wǒ gèrén dào hái tǐng xīnshǎng nà zhǒng de.
|vo_08_08_tl         = It's a pity, there's nobody at all in the Knights of Favonius right now who has inherited Grand Master [Varka]'s style of handling matters. Ah... I personally quite like that kind of person.
|vo_08_09_title_s    = 关于菲谢尔…
|vo_08_09_title_t    = 關於菲謝爾…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Fischl]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Fischl.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx_s       = 什么？你说菲谢尔遮起一只眼睛的神秘样子，的确很符合「断罪皇女」的形象？哈哈哈，按照这个规律，我至少也得是个末代皇族后裔，对吧？
|vo_08_09_tx_t       = 什麼？（你/妳）說菲謝爾遮起一隻眼睛的神秘樣子，的確很符合「斷罪皇女」的形象？哈哈哈，按照這個規律，我至少也得是個末代皇族後裔，對吧？
|vo_08_09_rm         = Shénme? Nǐ shuō Fēixiè'ěr zhē qǐ yīzhī yǎnjīng de shénmì yàngzi, díquè hěn fúhé "Duànzuì Huángnǚ" de xíngxiàng? Hāhā hā, ànzhào zhège guīlǜ, wǒ zhìshǎo yě děi shì gè mòdài huángzú hòuyì, duì ba?
|vo_08_09_tl         = What? You're saying that Fischl hiding one eye is very fitting for her image as "Prinzessin der Verurteilung"? Haha, by this logic, I should be a descendant of a last generation of royals, right?
|vo_08_10_title_s    = 关于诺艾尔…
|vo_08_10_title_t    = 關於諾艾爾…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx_s       = 我受代理团长大人所托，暗中照顾这位后辈。不过她很懂事，不需要我操太多心。真是令人欣慰。
|vo_08_10_tx_t       = 我受代理團長大人所託，暗中照顧這位後輩。不過她很懂事，不需要我操太多心。真是令人欣慰。
|vo_08_10_rm         = Wǒ shòu Dàilǐ Tuánzhǎng-dàrén suǒ tuō, ànzhōng zhàogù zhè wèi hòubèi. Bùguò tā hěn dǒngshì, bù xūyào wǒ cāo tài duō xīn. Zhēnshi lìng rén xīnwèi.
|vo_08_10_tl         = I was asked by the Acting Grand Master to secretly take care of this junior. But she's very sensible, so I don't need to worry much. Quite a relief.
|vo_08_11_title_s    = 关于罗莎莉亚…
|vo_08_11_title_t    = 關於蘿莎莉亞…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Rosaria]]
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Rosaria.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx_s       = 啊哈哈，你想知道罗莎莉亚修女的秘密吗？这个不能说。不过我对她印象还不错，比某人好多了。她能够诚实地面对自己。烂事就是烂事，提不起干劲就是提不起干劲。
|vo_08_11_tx_t       = 啊哈哈，（你/妳）想知道蘿莎莉亞修女的秘密嗎？這個不能說。不過我對她印象還不錯，比某人好多了。她能夠誠實地面對自己。爛事就是爛事，提不起幹勁就是提不起幹勁。
|vo_08_11_rm         = A hāhā, nǐ xiǎng zhīdào Luōshālìyà-xiūnǚ de mìmì ma? Zhège bùnéng shuō. Bùguò wǒ duì tā yìnxiàng hái bùcuò, bǐ mǒurén hǎoduōle. Tā nénggòu chéngshí de miànduì zìjǐ. Lànshì jiùshì lànshì, tíbuqǐ gànjìng jiùshì tíbuqǐ gànjìng.
|vo_08_11_tl         = Ahaha, you want to know Sister Rosaria's secrets? That I can't tell you. But I have a good impression of her, much better than most. She is honest with herself. Bad things are bad things, and if you're not interested, you're not interested.
|vo_08_12_title_s    = 关于砂糖…
|vo_08_12_title_t    = 關於砂糖…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Sucrose]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sucrose.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx_s       = 别看砂糖文静又内向，据说，她在实验室里，收藏了很多特别的东西哦，很刺激，又很…露骨的那种。嗯？你问我？…我像是会偷看女孩子房间的人吗？
|vo_08_12_tx_t       = 別看砂糖文靜又內向，據說，她在實驗室裡，收藏了很多特別的東西哦，很刺激，又很…露骨的那種。嗯？（你/妳）問我？…我像是會偷看女孩子房間的人嗎？
|vo_08_12_rm         = Bié kàn Shātáng wénjìng yòu nèixiàng, jùshuō, tā zài shíyàn shì lǐ, shōucángle hěnduō tèbié de dōngxī ó, hěn cìjī, yòu hěn... lùgǔ dì nà zhǒng. Ńg? Nǐ wèn wǒ?... Wǒ xiàng shì huì tōu kàn nǚ hái zǐ fángjiān de rén ma?
|vo_08_12_tl         = Don't think Sucrose just looks gentle and introverted, it is said that she has collected many special things within her experiment lab. [These things are] very exciting, but also very... explicit.<ref group="TN •">{{zh|露骨|rm=lùgǔ}} means explicit, but its literal meaning is also "to show bones." This is a pun on how Sucrose [[Sucrose/Lore#Character Story 3|collects bones as a hobby]].</ref> Hm? You're asking me? ...Do I even look like the type of person who would spy on girls' rooms?

|vo_08_13_title_s    = 关于柯莱…
|vo_08_13_title_t    = 關於柯萊…
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Collei]]
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Collei.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx_s       = 嗯，柯莱？真是个怀念的名字，你可找对人了！我来告诉你过去发生的事情吧，干脆从头说起&mdash;&mdash;保证原汁原味！
|vo_08_13_tx_t       = 嗯，柯萊？真是個懷念的名字，{{MC|你|妳}}真是找對人了！我來告訴{{MC|你|妳}}過去發生的事情吧，乾脆從頭說起&mdash;&mdash;保證原汁原味！
|vo_08_13_rm_s       = Ng, Kēlái? Zhēn shì gè huáiniàn de míngzi, nǐ kě zhǎo duì rénle! Wǒ lái gàosù nǐ guòqù fāshēng de shìqíng ba, gāncuì cóngtóu shuōqǐ{{lmdash}}bǎozhèng yuánzhī-yuánwèi!
|vo_08_13_rm_t       = Ng, Kēlái? Zhēn shì gè huáiniàn de míngzi, nǐ zhēnshì zhǎo duì rénle! Wǒ lái gàosù nǐ guòqù fāshēng de shìqíng ba, gāncuì cóngtóu shuōqǐ{{lmdash}}bǎozhèng yuánzhī-yuánwèi!
|vo_08_13_tl         = Oh, Collei? What a nostalgic name. You've come to the right person! Let me regale you with all the stories from back then. We might as well start from the top{{lmdash}}I guarantee I'll tell it like it is!

|vo_08_14_title_s    = 关于米卡…
|vo_08_14_title_t    = 關於米卡…
|vo_08_14_friendship = 4
|vo_08_14_subtitle   = About [[Mika]]
|vo_08_14_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mika.ogg
|vo_08_14_tx_s       = 刚开始接触那会儿，我看米卡容易紧张，就跟他开了一点无关痛痒的小玩笑。哪知他更紧张了，连笑都笑得很僵硬…最后还特意写信道歉。欸，这种单纯老实的品质，难道是施密特家族的遗传？
|vo_08_14_tx_t       = 剛開始接觸那時，我看米卡容易緊張，就跟他開了一點無關緊要的小玩笑。誰知道他更緊張了，連笑都笑得很僵硬…最後還特地寫信道歉。欸，這種單純老實的性格，難道是施密特家族的遺傳？
|vo_08_14_rm_s       = Gāng kāishǐ jiēchù nà huìr, wǒ kàn Mǐkǎ róngyì jǐnzhāng, jiù gēn tā kāile yīdiǎn wúguāntòngyǎng de xiǎo-wánxiào. Nǎzhī tā gèng jǐnzhāngle, lián xiào dōu xiào dé hěn jiāngyìng... Zuìhòu hái tèyì xiěxìn dàoqiàn. Ei, zhè zhǒng dānchún lǎoshí de pǐnzhì, nándào shì Shīmìtè jiāzú de yíchuán?
|vo_08_14_rm_t       = Gāng kāishǐ jiēchù nà shí, wǒ kàn Mǐkǎ róngyì jǐnzhāng, jiù gēn tā kāile yīdiǎn wúguānjǐnyào de xiǎo-wánxiào. Shéi zhīdào tā gèng jǐnzhāngle, lián xiào dōu xiào dé hěn jiāngyìng... Zuìhòu hái tèyì xiěxìn dàoqiàn. Ei, zhè zhǒng dānchún lǎoshí de xìnggé, nándào shì Shīmìtè jiāzú de yíchuán?
|vo_08_14_tl         = When I first met him, I noticed that Mika's prone to getting nervous, so I just started cracking some silly jokes with him. But this just made him even '''more''' nervous. Even his laugh was awkward... In the end, he ended up writing a whole letter to apologize. Sigh, could this sort of honest and innocent personality be a trademark of the Schmidt family?

|vo_09_01_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其一
|vo_09_01_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其一
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx_s       = 骑兵队长的头衔可没什么了不起的。说起来，蒙德城的骑兵都被大团长带走了。呵呵。
|vo_09_01_tx_t       = 騎兵隊長的頭銜可沒什麼了不起的。說起來，蒙德城的騎兵都被大團長帶走了。呵呵。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Qíbīng Duìzhǎng de tóuxián kě méishénme liǎobuqǐ de. Shuō qǐlái, Méngdé-chéng de qíbīng dōu bèi Dà-tuánzhǎng dài zǒule. Hēhe.
|vo_09_01_tl         = Being the Cavalry Captain is nothing extraordinary. Speaking of which, Mondstadt City's cavalries were all taken away by the Grand Master. Heh.
|vo_09_02_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其二
|vo_09_02_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其二
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx_s       = 其实西风骑士团一共有十位队长。但不是所有人都有队长级的实力。
|vo_09_02_tx_t       = 其實西風騎士團一共有十位隊長。但不是所有人都有隊長級的實力。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Qíshí Xīfēng Qíshìtuan yīgòng yǒu shí wèi dùizhǎng. Dàn búshì suǒyǒu rén dōu yǒu dùizhǎng de shílì.
|vo_09_02_tl         = There are actually ten captains in the Knights of Favonius. But not all of them have the strength of a captain.
|vo_09_03_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其三
|vo_09_03_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其三
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx_s       = 我的眼睛？我的眼睛没事。想把身体的某些部分遮起来是很平常的事儿吧？衣服和裤子也是一个道理。
|vo_09_03_tx_t       = 我的眼睛？我的眼睛沒事。想把身體的某些部分遮起來是很平常的事吧？衣服和褲子也是一個道理。
|vo_09_03_rm_s       = Wǒ de yǎnjīng? Wǒ de yǎnjīng méishì. Xiǎng bǎ shēntǐ de mǒuxiē bùfèn zhēqǐlái shì hěn píngcháng de shìr ba? Yīfú hé kùzi yěshì yīgè dàolǐ.
|vo_09_03_rm_t       = Wǒ de yǎnjīng? Wǒ de yǎnjīng méishì. Xiǎng bǎ shēntǐ de mǒuxiē bùfèn zhēqǐlái shì hěn píngcháng de shì ba? Yīfú hàn kùzi yěshì yīgè dàolǐ.
|vo_09_03_tl         = My eye? My eye is fine. Wanting to cover up certain body parts should be a normal thing. It goes the same for shirts and pants.
|vo_09_04_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其四
|vo_09_04_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其四
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx_s       = 坎瑞亚？哦，你知道的真多。坎瑞亚的荣耀早已不在，剩下的如今都已沦为罪人，又何必再提起他们。
|vo_09_04_tx_t       = 坎瑞亞？哦，（你/妳）知道的真多。坎瑞亞的榮耀早已不在，剩下的如今都已淪為罪人，又何必再提起他們。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Kǎnruìyǎ? Ó, nǐ zhīdào de zhēn duō. Kǎnruìyǎ de róngyào zǎoyǐ bùzài, shèngxià de rújīn dōu yǐ lúnwèi zuìrén, yòu hébì zài tíqǐ tāmen.
|vo_09_04_tl         = Khaenri'ah? Oh, you know a lot. Khaenri'ah's honor is long gone, and all that remains are those deemed as sinners. There is no need to bring them up again.
|vo_09_05_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其五
|vo_09_05_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其五
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx_s       = 原来我们已经相遇这么久了。跟你一起旅行，大概是我这辈子遇上的最有趣的事儿了，今后可别让我失望哦。
|vo_09_05_tx_t       = 原來我們已經相遇這麼久了。跟（你/妳）一起旅行，大概是我這輩子遇上的最有趣的事了，今後可別讓我失望哦。
|vo_09_05_rm_s       = Yuánlái wǒmen yǐjīng xiāngyù zhème jiǔle. Gēn nǐ yīqǐ lǚxíng, dàgài shì wǒ zhè bèizi yù shàng de zuì yǒuqù de shìrle, jīnhòu kě bié ràng wǒ shīwàng o.
|vo_09_05_rm_t       = Yuánlái wǒmen yǐjīng xiāngyù zhème jiǔle. Gēn nǐ yīqǐ lǚxíng, dàgài shì wǒ zhè bèizi yù shàng de zuì yǒuqù de shìle, jīnhòu kě bié ràng wǒ shīwàng o.
|vo_09_05_tl         = I see that we have have met for this long. Traveling with you is just about the most interesting thing in my life. From now on, don't let me be disappointed.
|vo_10_01_title_s    = {name_s}的爱好…
|vo_10_01_title_t    = {name_t}的愛好…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx_s       = 品酒也是一种艺术，蒙德的酒是风神的恩赐，懂得好好品味才不会浪费了这份幸运。
|vo_10_01_tx_t       = 品酒也是一種藝術，蒙德的酒是風神的恩賜，懂得好好品味才不會浪費了這份幸運。
|vo_10_01_rm_s       = Pǐnjiǔ yěshì yī zhǒng yìshù, Méngdé de jiǔ shì Fēngshén de ēncì, dǒngde hǎohao pǐnwèi cái bùhuì làngfèile zhè fèn xìngyùn.
|vo_10_01_rm_t       = Pǐnjiǔ yěshì yī zhǒng yìshù, Méngdé de jiǔ shì Fēngshén de ēnsì, dǒngde hǎohao pǐnwèi cái bùhuì làngfèile zhè fèn xìngyùn.
|vo_10_01_tl         = Wine-tasting is also a type of art. Mondstadt's wines are the Wind Archon's gift, and knowing to relish is a way to not waste this lucky opportunity.
|vo_10_02_title_s    = {name_s}的烦恼…
|vo_10_02_title_t    = {name_t}的煩惱…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx_s       = 孤独？怎么会，现在不就有人在我身边唠叨么。
|vo_10_02_tx_t       = 孤獨？怎麼會，現在不就有人在我身邊嘮叨嗎。
|vo_10_02_rm_s       = Gūdú? Zěnme huì, xiànzài bù jiù yǒu rén zài wǒ shēnbiān láodāo me.
|vo_10_02_rm_t       = Gūdú? Zěnme huì, xiànzài bù jiù yǒu rén zài wǒ shēnbiān láodāo ma.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Loneliness? Why, isn't there a person next to me nagging me right now.
|vo_10_03_title_s    = 喜欢的食物…
|vo_10_03_title_t    = 喜歡的食物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx_s       = 蒙德特酿的起泡白葡萄酒，兑上三份蒲公英酒，苦味会被完美中和，这种酒名叫「午后之死」。美味。
